projects.title: Roller Coaster
projects.description: A Roller Coaster themed scene made in OpenGL. Implemented multiple common features, including post process shaders, environment map (reflection / refraction), various curves, Phong Lighting, simple particle system. etc.

projects.title: Dungeon Game
projects.description: A mini game that resembles a dungeon. With potions and enemies, each with 2 types. Goal is to kill all enemies, and advance on to the next level.

projects.title: Portfolio Website Version #1
projects.description: Porfolio Website. My first static website without a backend database. Using html, css and vanilla js. No frameworks.

projects.title: Portfolio Website Version #2
projects.description: Revamped version of the version #1 counterpart, built using Vue.js and TailwindCSS, added animations and made better optimizations for mobile users. Added more features as well. In general improved the UX.

projects.title: Image Editor
projects.description: A very simple GUI app, that allows you to load images and rotate, scale, blend images, various dithering techniques, various quantization techniques.

projects.title: Maze
projects.description: A maze that uses OpenGL as its rendering engine, implementing frustum culling.
